SEARCH
Package controller

Interface Controller

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerImpl
public interface Controller
This interface represents all the operations to be supported by a controller implementation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addShareWithApiInput()
    Receives share information from the user and passes it to the model interface object.
    void
    createPortfolio()
    Asks the user for input like if he wants to add shares, once a share is added the user get the option to create the portfolio.
    boolean
    showValuationOfPortfolio(String selectedId)
    Returns the valuation of the portfolio which the user has entered and returns false if the portfolio with the given id does not exist.
    void
    start()
    Behaves as the main menu for the program and gives the option to view, create and upload portfolio and navigate to appropriate state flow based on user interaction and model interface output.
    void
    uploadPortfolio()
    Sends the path from where the portfolio needs to be uploaded to the model interface object and notifies the user if something goes wrong during upload.
    void
    viewPortfolio()
    Interacts with the model interface object to get all portfolio information and then returns the same to the user as string output.

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      void createPortfolio()
      Asks the user for input like if he wants to add shares, once a share is added the user get the option to create the portfolio. On receiving confirmation from the user the function interacts with the model interface object to transmit the portfolio information to be created.

    • showValuationOfPortfolio

      boolean showValuationOfPortfolio(String selectedId)
      Returns the valuation of the portfolio which the user has entered and returns false if the portfolio with the given id does not exist.
      Parameters:
      selectedId - unique id of the portfolio for which the valuation is required on a particular date
      Returns:
      "true" if valuation exists else return "false"

    • viewPortfolio

      void viewPortfolio()
      Interacts with the model interface object to get all portfolio information and then returns the same to the user as string output.

    • addShareWithApiInput

      void addShareWithApiInput()
      Receives share information from the user and passes it to the model interface object.

    • start

      void start()
      Behaves as the main menu for the program and gives the option to view, create and upload portfolio and navigate to appropriate state flow based on user interaction and model interface output.

    • uploadPortfolio

      void uploadPortfolio()
      Sends the path from where the portfolio needs to be uploaded to the model interface object and notifies the user if something goes wrong during upload.
